root.name: Lume
root.description: Overview Lume is a point and click puzzle game made by State of Play, which features puzzles mostly based on light and dark. It was released for PC and Mac on various digital distribution outlets on May 10th 2011.Production Lume has a unique papercraft look, as it is made of cardboard and paper models which have been filmed in high definition. The developers built small scale sets which included doll house props, with characters then added in via flash animation.Story The game puts the player in the role of a girl whose grandfather's house loses power. He also disappears, and it's up to the granddaughter to turn the lights back on and find him.System Requirements PCOS: Windows XP, Vista, 7.Processor: 1.8 Ghz.Memory: 1 GB RAM.Hard Disk Space: 25 MB available hard drive space.Mac OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8, Snow Leopard 10.6.3, or later.Processor: 1Ghz.Memory: 1 GB RAM.Hard Disk Space: 25 MB available hard drive space.
